metadata.description: Development tools and skills for bioinformatics tool developers working with MultiQC and similar projects

plugins.name: creating-multiqc-modules
plugins.description: Generate complete MultiQC module implementations from GitHub issue specifications, including parsing code, visualizations, tests, and configuration. Use when creating new bioinformatics tool modules or responding to module requests.

plugins.name: analyzing-log-files
plugins.description: Examines unfamiliar bioinformatics tool log files to identify structure, data format, parsing strategies, and visualization opportunities. Use when encountering new log formats or designing module parsing logic.

plugins.name: creating-multiqc-template
plugins.description: Guide for developing custom MultiQC report templates to customize report appearance, branding, and visualization. Covers Python package structure, Jinja2 templates, asset management, custom plotting functions, and child template inheritance.
